context_of_use: The system allows users and customers to access and manage report data.
stakeholders_and_interests: users want to analyze data offline
customers want to view reports for decision making
description: Allow users and customers to view and download available reports for analysis.
triggering_event: User or customer requests to view or download reports.
preconditions: User or customer must be logged into the system.
Reports must be available in the system.
postconditions: User or customer successfully views or downloads the report.
User or customer can analyze the report offline.
assumptions: Users and customers have the necessary permissions to access reports.
Reports are generated and stored in the system.
requirements_met: The system must provide a user interface for viewing reports.
The system must allow downloading of reports.
main_flow: 1. User or customer requests to view reports → System displays available reports.
2. User or customer selects a report to download → System initiates download of the selected report.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no reports are available, the system displays a message indicating unavailability.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the download fails, the system displays an error message.
